channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bill to prevent federal-government shutdown includes a raise for lawmakers
AMD invests in GPU cloud provider Vultr at $3.5 billion valuation
item.description: AMD's investment in Vultr comes after Nvidia backed GPU startup CoreWeave.

item.title: Slow Ventures is raising $275 million across two new funds: filings
item.description: The New York, San Francisco, and Boston-based early stage fund is run by Kevin Colleran, Sam Lessin, and Will Quist.

item.title: Jeff Bezos saved around $1 billion in taxes by moving to a ‘billionaire bunker’ in Florida
item.description: The Amazon founder saw an almost-10-figure savings by moving south.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Nvidia, Ollie's Bargain Outlet, Birkenstock, Disney and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: US says Pentagon is not behind mysterious drone flights
item.description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday night said “We are following this closely. So far, no sense of danger.”

item.title: The stock market's rally is getting narrow again. Here's why.
Oscar Meyer will pay you $35,000 a year—plus health benefits, free hotel stays, and a weekly allowance—to drive the Weinermobile around the country
Stellantis further delays electric Ram pickup to prioritize plug-in 'EREV' model
item.description: Stellantis said Wednesday it will further delay an all-electric Ram pickup from next year until 2026.

item.title: Investors brace for hawkish Fed rate cut – and more volatile markets in 2025
Bitcoin’s rally is nudging more luxury companies to make crypto a payment option—and sends a strong message to its younger clientele
item.description: Ferrari launched crypto payments on its ultra-luxury cars last year in response to demand from dealers and buyers who were also crypto investors.

item.title: You have a 72% chance of making money in the stock market next year
What Honda’s merger talks with Nissan tell us about Chinese strength in EVs
Why Wall Street's S&P 500 forecast for 2025 is likely to be 'way off'
item.description: "A paradox exists in equity markets: Average returns do not occur often," said Juan Correa of BCA Research.

item.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone chats
item.description: OpenAI on Wednesday rolled out a new way to talk to its viral chatbot: 1-800-CHATGPT.
